授業目的: The purpose of the course is to give students the necessary tools they need to become proficient English communicators in an online, on-demand format. Assessment is primarily focused on speaking through an asynchronous video app, with written online discussions also forming a key component to success.
到達目標:
- to explore and discuss a wide range of topics 
- to feel confident expressing your ideas and opinions
- to create and do a presentation based on class material
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ですので、60単位を超えて卒業に必要な単位として算入することができません（60単位までしか算入できない）。ただし、本授業科目が卒業に必要な単位として算入できない科目の場合は、たとえオンライン授業であっても“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”とはなりません。
The course is subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses and cannot be included as part of the credits required for graduation beyond 60 credits (only up to 60 credits can be counted). However, if the course is originally not credited toward graduation, it will not be determined as subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses, regardless of the online format.
授業方法:
Online
The course will be conducted on LUNA. Please check the course page on Luna in the first week.

トピック.授業外学習2: Homework as assigned by the teacher.
